library(kableExtra)
kable(my_table, row.names = FALSE, 
			col.names = c("Gen","Ciclo umbral (Ct)"), 
			align = "lc") %>%
			column_spec(1, border_left = TRUE) %>% 
			column_spec(2, border_right = TRUE) %>%
			row_spec(0,bold=TRUE) %>%
			kable_styling("bordered", position = "center") %>%
			add_footnote("S/A = Sin amplificación", notation = "none")
